content.thinking: The user wants me to add a small feature to their app. Let me first read the current page.tsx file to understand what the app looks like and then suggest/add a small feature.

This is a todo app with filtering and localStorage persistence. Let me add a small, useful feature. Some options:

1. Double-click to edit a todo
2. Drag and drop to reorder
3. Due date for todos
4. A "toggle all" checkbox
5. Keyboard shortcut to add todo (already has Enter)
6. Show remaining count instead of completed count
7. Search/filter todos by text

I'll add a simple "toggle all" checkbox - it's small but useful. It will let users mark all todos as complete or incomplete with one click.

content.text: This is a nice todo app. I'll add a "toggle all" checkbox that lets you mark all todos as complete/incomplete with one click.
